rubric.content: Click on each term and definition button to match them.

contents.htmlData: Someone the instructional designer works with to understand course content {{SME}} 	A high-level document that communicates a strategy for an instructional design project {{Design Document}} 	Detailed screen-by-screen design that communicates the exact content as it will be shown to learners {{Storyboard}} 	In instructional design, an ongoing process that reviews and assesses a project while it is in development {{Formative Evaluation}} 	In instructional design, a process for assessing a project after it is completed which includes evaluating learners, and the project itself {{Summative Evaluation}}
